hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT DISTINCT EOTO.EOTO_ID, EOTO.CREATOR, EOTO.CREATE_TIME, EOTO.MODIFIER, EOTO.MODIFY_TIME, EOTO.REC_VER, EOTO.REC_STATUS, EOTO.ORG_ID, EOTO.EOTO_LOGISTIC_NO, EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_PRIORITY_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_PRIORITY_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_TRANS_TYPE_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_TRANS_TYPE_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_PHONE, EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_TIME, EOTO.EOTO_DIVIDE_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_DIVIDE_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_FM, EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_TO, EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_FM, EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_TO, EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_DEPARTMENT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_DEPARTMENT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_OPERATE_DEPARTMENT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_OPERATE_DEPARTMENT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CONTACT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CONTACT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CONTACT_PHONE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_LOCATION_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_LOCATION_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_REGION_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_REGION_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CITY_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CITY_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_DISTRICT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_DISTRICT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_PHONE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_REGION_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_REGION_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CITY_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CITY_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_DISTRICT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_DISTRICT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_PO_NO, EOTO.EOTO_SO_NO, EOTO.EOTO_DO_NO, EOTO.EOTO_BARCODE, EOTO.EOTO_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOTO.EOTO_QUANTITY, EOTO.EOTO_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOTO.EOTO_NET_WEIGHT, EOTO.EOTO_VOLUME, EOTO.EOTO_REQUIREMENT, EOTO.EOTO_REMARK, EOTO.EOTO_EXPIRATION_TIME, EOTO.EOTO_RESERVATION, EOTO.EOTO_SALESMAN_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SALESMAN_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_NAME,
EOTO.EOTO_EMERGENT_FLAG, EOTO.EOTO_PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_PAYMENT_TYPE_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_WAREHOUSER_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_WAREHOUSER_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_STATION_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_STATION_NAME,
EOTO.EOTO_EVENT_OBJECT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_EVENT_OBJECT_NAME
FROM EO_TEMPLATE_ORDER EOTO LEFT JOIN EO_TEMPLATE_ORDER_ITEM EOTI ON EOTO.EOTO_CODE=EOTI.EOTI_EOTO_CODE AND EOTO.ORG_ID=EOTI.ORG_ID AND EOTI.REC_STATUS=0 WHERE 1=1 << AND EOTO.ORG_ID =:orgId >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_ID LIKE :eotoId >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_LOGISTIC_NO LIKE :eotoLogisticNo >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CODE LIKE :eotoCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_NAME LIKE :eotoName >> << AND EOTO.REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SO_NO LIKE :eotoSoNo >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_DO_NO LIKE :eotoDoNo >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_PO_NO LIKE :eotoPoNo >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_REQUIREMENT LIKE :eotoRequirement >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_REMARK LIKE :eotoRemark >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eotoOrderTypeCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_TYPE_NAME like :eotoOrderTypeName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_PRIORITY_CODE LIKE :eotoPriorityCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_TRANS_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eotoTransTypeCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CODE LIKE :eotoCustomerCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_NAME like :eotoCustomerName>> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_CODE LIKE :eotoCustomerContactCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_NAME like :eotoCustomerContactName>> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_PHONE LIKE :eotoCustomerContactPhone >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_TIME >= :eotoOrderTimeFrom >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_TIME <= :eotoOrderTimeTo >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_TO >= :eotoRequireShipperTimeFrom >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_FM <= :eotoRequireShipperTimeTo >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_TO >= :eotoRequireConsigneeTimeFrom >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_FM <= :eotoRequireConsigneeTimeTo >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_DEPARTMENT_CODE LIKE :eotoOrderDepartmentCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_DEPARTMENT_NAME like :eotoOrderDepartmentName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_OPERATE_DEPARTMENT_CODE LIKE :eotoOperateDepartmentCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_OPERATE_DEPARTMENT_NAME like :eotoOperateDepartmentName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_DIVIDE_CODE LIKE :eotoDivideCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_DIVIDE_NAME like :eotoDivideName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_BARCODE LIKE :eotoBarCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CODE LIKE :eotoShipperCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_NAME like :eotoShipperName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CONTACT_CODE LIKE :eotoShipperContactCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CONTACT_NAME like :eotoShipperContactName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CONTACT_PHONE LIKE :eotoShipperContactPhone >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_LOCATION_CODE LIKE :eotoShipperLocationCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_LOCATION_NAME like :eotoShipperLocationName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_REGION_CODE LIKE :eotoShipperRegionCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_REGION_NAME like :eotoShipperRegionName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CODE LIKE :eotoConsigneeCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_NAME like :eotoConsigneeName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_CODE LIKE :eotoConsigneeContactCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_NAME like :eotoConsigneeContactName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_PHONE LIKE :eotoConsigneeContactPhone >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_CODE LIKE :eotoConsigneeLocationCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_NAME like :eotoConsigneeLocationName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_REGION_CODE LIKE :eotoConsigneeRegionCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_REGION_NAME like :eotoConsigneeRegionName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_EXPIRATION_TIME>=:eotoExpirationTimeFrom>> << AND EOTO.EOTO_EXPIRATION_TIME<=:eotoExpirationTimeTo>> << AND EOTO.EOTO_RESERVATION like :eotoReservation >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SALESMAN_CODE like :eotoSalesmanCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_SALESMAN_NAME like :eotoSalesmanName >> << AND EOTI.EOTI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_CODE LIKE :eotiTemperatureLevelCode>> << AND EOTI.EOTI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_NAME LIKE :eotiTemperatureLevelName>> << AND EOTI.EOTI_CODE LIKE :eotiCode >> << AND EOTI.EOTI_NAME like :eotiName >> << AND EOTI.EOTI_LOT_NO LIKE :eotiLotNo >> << AND EOTI.EOTI_REMARK LIKE :eotiRemark >>
<< AND EOTO.EOTO_WAREHOUSER_CODE LIKE :eotoWarehouserCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_WAREHOUSER_NAME like :eotoWarehouserName >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_STATION_CODE LIKE :eotoStationCode >> << AND EOTO.EOTO_STATION_NAME like :eotoStationName >> ORDER BY EOTO.MODIFY_TIME DESC
